channel.title: Making a hole new type of Runescape!
channel.description:
Hello anyone intrested, First I would like to say i'm sorry for any mistakes I make with spelling i'll try my best to spell things right.
Anyways this is going to be a hard task what i mean from [b][shadow=red,left]"making a hole new Runescape!"[/shadow] :) [/b]
[ol][li][b]I'm thinking that combat should be changed.[/b][/li] [li][b]making players be-able to make custom Things I.E walking, weapons, and lots more.[/b][/li] [li][b]make new skills.[/b][/li] [li][b]get good working construction(skill)[/b][/li] [li][b]make new mapdate.[/b][/li][/ol] [b]make source from [font=arial, sans-serif][size=medium].Jagex_cache_32 [hr] Okey,[/size][/font][/b] [b][font=arial, sans-serif][size=medium]now If anyone thinks I'v missed something or would like to take part in making this[/size][/font][/b] [b]"Making a hole new Runescape!"[/b] [b][font=arial, sans-serif][size=medium][font=verdana][/size][size=small]Please leave a post with your details and idea's in bullet points.[/size][/font][/size][size=medium][/font][/b] [b][font=arial, sans-serif][/size][size=medium][font=verdana][/size][size=small]and in a Quote.[/size][/font][/size][size=medium][/font][/b] [b][font=arial, sans-serif][/size][size=medium][font=verdana][/size][size=small] [hr] [u][shadow=red,left]Thank You[/shadow][/u][/size][/font][/size][size=medium][/font][/b]

item.title: Making a hole new type of Runescape!
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:17, topic:336914”]Hello to anyone interested,

This is going to be a large task.
Here is what I mean when I say I’m [shadow=red,left]making a whole new Runescape:[/shadow]

[ol][li]I’m thinking that combat should be changed.[/li]
[li]making players be-able to make custom Things I.E walking, weapons, and lots more.[/li]
[li]make new skills.[/li]
[li]get good working construction(skill)[/li]
[li]make new mapdate.[/li][/ol]

[hr]
Okey,now if anyone thinks I’ve missed something or would like to take part in making this, please leave a post with your details and ideas in bullet points.
[hr]
[color=#ff0000][u][shadow=red,left]Thank You[/shadow]

[code]Hello to anyone interested,

This is going to be a large task.
Here is what I mean when I say I’m [shadow=red,left]making a whole new Runescape:[/shadow]

[ol][li]I’m thinking that combat should be changed.[/li]
[li]making players be-able to make custom Things I.E walking, weapons, and lots more.[/li]
[li]make new skills.[/li]
[li]get good working construction(skill)[/li]
[li]make new mapdate.[/li][/ol]

[hr]
Okey,now if anyone thinks I’ve missed something or would like to take part in making this, please leave a post with your details and ideas in bullet points.
[hr]
[color=#ff0000][u][shadow=red,left]Thank You[/shadow][/code]

Fixed for you[/quote]

Fixed? Still whos going to join a Development Team with someone who can’t spell?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a hole new type of Runescape!

item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

[quote=“danny no1, post:7, topic:336914”]=| its just a faster way to spell it
fucking tool.
any way what i mean so they can say…
there was know dragon platebody in the server,
you could make it.
and add to server =p
and its going to be 562 i think the new graphic’s[/quote]

Faster way to spell it? Like the way you spelt “no”? ROFL.

You spelled whole wrong. Hole is like a hole you would dig in the ground.

I believe he’s dug him self a pretty deep hole so far.

item.title: Making a hole new type of Runescape!
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

I don’t think this is going to turn out well.

You haven’t even followed the things you need:

-Pictures : Showing that it is true.
-Base : What type of base are you using.
-Moderator saying “Yes” : I’m not sure you need this.

Read full topic
